venue.name: Dilboy VFW Hall in Davis Square

item.description:
Happy Valentine's Day!


Join us for a Valentine's Day Cosplay/Semi-Formal Potluck Ball.


 


Attire: Dress to the nines in your favorite cosplay, evening dress, or shirt and tails. Anything but t-shirt and jeans is acceptable.


Food: Guests are required to bring their favorite potluck dinner item to share with the group. There is no restriction on the food type, so feel free to bring Japanese or anything else. Also, a little goes a long way, so no need to worry about providing enough for everyone. If each person brings enough for 4 then there will be more than enough for everyone to eat.


Entertainment: There will be music for dancing and alcohol provided by the facility (cash purchase only), so make sure to bring your dancing shoes, ID, and money for drinks.


Cover Charge: There will be a small fee of $10.00 payable at the door to attend. I know everyone is bringing food, however, this small fee will cover the cost of the hall and incidentals like plates, napkins, utensils, and basic decorations.


All are Welcome: This is a great opportunity to meet new members of the group and/or socialize with existing members and friends. Guests are also welcome. Feel free to invite friends, boyfriends, random friends you meet on the T along the way... lol ok maybe not random strangers on the T or street, but just about everyone else is welcome.


I'm also going to look into inviting other similar type groups to make things more diverse and fun.


Location: Dilboy VFW Hall in Davis Square 

This is a joint meetup event.

Hope to see you there!!
item.name: Valentine's Day Cosplay/Semi-Formal Potluck Ball
